module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: Front page benetifs :An easy and quick installation that allows you to make all your national and international Colissimo withdrawal points available to your e-buyersEntering the tariff point withdrawal directly on Prestashop A customization of the front page point withdrawal in harmony with the design of your site Colissimo simplicité benefits : A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: paypal
module.categoryName: Pago con Tarjeta o Carteras digitales
module.description: Líder en pagos en la web, PayPal ofrece soluciones seguras, sencillas en las que confían más de 220 millones de usuarios
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Líder en pagos en la web, PayPal ofrece soluciones seguras, sencillas en las que confían más de 220 millones de usuarios.Con este, te beneficiarás de la mejor plataforma de pagos y tu negocio crecerá en Internet, a nivel móvil e internacionalmente
module.additional_description: Facilidad de activación: Con PayPal, puedes empezar a aceptar pagos casi de forma inmediata y sin cuotas de alta. Aumenta la tasa de conversión hasta un 87,5% gracias a nuestras soluciones optimizadas para dispositivos móviles. No se necesitan procesos de integración adicionales. Además, con One Touch™, tus clientes pueden pagar sus compras más rápido que nunca. Protección del vendedor: protege tus ingresos frente al fraude virtual gracias a nuestra Protección del vendedor. Cubrimos artículos tangibles e intangibles y la mayoría de servicios. Con una política de tarifas muy clara y sin sorpresas. Sin tarifas ocultas.  Solo se te aplicará una tarifa cuando recibas un pago.  Además, cuantas más transacciones recibas, menor será la tarifa. *Tasa de conversión con One Touch™ calculada durante el cuarto trimestre de 2015 como parte de un estudio de comScore. Grupo de muestra en EE. UU.

module.name: mondialrelay
module.categoryName: Punto de entrega y Recogida en tienda
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.7 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita de la versión 1.4. a 1.7
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.7 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita de la versión 1.4. a 1.7.  Entregando más de 40 millones de paquetes al año mediante su red de 8.000 puntos de recogida (Punto Pack® en España o Points Relais® en Francia, Bélgica y Luxemburgo), o vía entregas a domicilio, Mondial Relay es hoy uno de los más importantes actores del sector de las entregas a particulares. Los más importantes sites de comercio electrónico han elegido los servicios de Mondial Relay debido a la calidad de su oferta y el control total de los procesos logísticos. En Francia 12 de los 15 primeros sites son clientes de Mondial Relay.  Mondial Relay quiere compartir y desarrollar este saber hacer con todos los e-comerciantes, cualquier sea su nivel de actividad, sin imposición de volúmenes mínimos.   Ahora esta oferta de servicios está disponible en Prestashop. Con el acceso a las mismas soluciones de entrega en puntos de recogida, hasta la fecha reservadas a nuestras grandes cuentas, sus clientes tendrán a partir de hoy más opciones, y podrán escoger la entrega de sus pedidos en una tienda de conveniencia beneficiándose de la red más amplia a nivel europeo, con el mejor nivel de calidad posible (franjas horarias, ubicaciones).
module.additional_description: Con este módulo enriqueces tu oferta comercial dando a tus clientes más opciones de entrega de sus pedidos. Los consumidores aprecian la posibilidad de poder recoger sus pedidos donde y cuando les vaya bien sin tener que esperar en casa la llegada de un repartidor. Añadiendo esta opción en el check-out mejorará la tasa de conversión de las visitas.  Las funcionalidades están a la altura de las expectativas de los consumidores más exigentes:Búsqueda de los puntos de entrega con geolocalización, horarios e distanciasEnvío al cliente de una notificación de llegada de su paquete (mail y SMS)Tracking desde la admisión del paquete en la red Mondial Relay hasta su entrega finalVerificación de la identidad del destinatario y POD en formato electrónicoExtranet dedicado para post-venta y generación de etiquetas  de devolución

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.displayName: Envíos Boxtal - punto de entrega, a domicilio, express
module.description: Gestiona distintos trasportistas a través de un solo modulo y ahorra hasta un 75% en tus gastos de expedición sin compromiso de volumen ni de contrato
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Gestiona distintos trasportistas a través de un solo modulo y ahorra hasta un 75% en tus gastos de expedición sin compromiso de volumen ni de contrato.
module.additional_description: 1. MEJORA LA TASA DE TRANSFORMACIÓN DE TUS CESTASOfrece la opción a tus clientes de distintos modos de envío a través de nuestra selección de transportistas en punto de entrega, a domicilio o en express. 2. REDUCE TUS GASTOS DE TRANSPORTE Aprovecha nuestras tarifas negociadas con reducciones de hasta un 75% con respecto a los precios públicos con los mejores transportistas del mercado, sin condición de volumen ni de contrato. 3. AHORRA TIEMPO EN LA GESTION DE TUS EXPEDICIONESGenera tus albaranes en 1 solo clic y sigue tus envíos desde nuestro back-office Prestashop. Una sola factura para todos los transportistas. 4. ACELERA EL LANZAMIENTO DE TU SITIO WEBUn solo modulo a instalar para generar todos tus envíos. Boxtal es tu único interlocutor antes, durante y después de la expedición, sean cuales sean los transportistas seleccionados. Ahorra tiempo y concéntrate en lo esencial.

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration. Automatic data transfer and the real-time transaction notification enable a smooth payment process and a faster delivery.
module.additional_description: Attractive- Cost savings through low fees- Credited funds are irreversible- Low default risk- Low storage costs thanks to short processing times Easy- Automated and transparent processes- Easy integration thanks to more than 100 plug-ins for standardized shop systems as well as an efficient API for individual shop systems- Convenient for your customers as they can use their online banking details- No eWallet and thus no registration required for your customers Fast- Funds are transferred directly from customer’s online banking account to your bank account- Real-time transaction notification after the transfer has been listed- All within one process - faster than advanced payment (by bank transfer)- Fast cash flow, high liquidity Secure- Data is transferred in an encrypted form via secured connections- Payment system certified by TÜV Saarland with a certified data protection (TÜV Saarland is a German, state-approved monitoring body for the inspection and maintenance of security standards)- Data processing center in Germany in accordance with strict banking standards

In addition, PrestaShop merchants process credit and debit card transactions with a secure checkout form, which is displayed directly on your checkout page so shoppers never leave your store.

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer.To a private address: such as home, office or a family member.To one of our 1250 pick-up points: post offices or post points like supermarkets (Delhaize, Spar), bookshops (Press Shop, Relay), service stations (Total, Q8) and neighbourhood stores.To one of our 150 parcel lockers: ideally situated in high footfall locations, stations and shopping centres. Simplifying your logistics   With the Shipping Manager, your customers select their delivery method when they place their order online. You just need to take care of the practical aspects.Follow-up and preparation of your parcelsCreation of shipping and return labels, both domestic and internationalManagement of parcels shipmentsTracking  of your parcels  This add-on is available for free to all customers who have a signed parcels contract with bpost.
module.additional_description: Shipping Manager is an application that helps you manage your parcel shipments and create your shipping and return labels, both domestic and international. • Easy to integrate, plug and play. • Simple integration in your online shop: during the order process your customers will not even notice they have been transferred to Shipping Manager • Immediate access to the three bpost delivery methods: o Home delivery o Delivery to a pick-up point o Delivery to a parcel locker • Management of your parcel deliveries through the Administration module (label printing, parcel tracking, parcel preparation follow-up). • Thanks to its adaptive design, the graphical user interface automatically changes to suit the customer’s viewing device (smartphone, tablet, PC). • Configuration of prices based on delivery method, immediately visible in the online shop • Access to the most popular options for your shipments (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) • Printing directly from the backend of Prestashop • Track and trace your parcels online from the backend

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Try a free live chat with visitor recording Smartsupp is a combination of live chat and visitor recording, making it the only tool you’ll need to get to understand your visitors. With Smartsupp you can chat with visitors in real-time and also watch their behavior on your website. Know everything about your visitors The Smartsupp plugin lets you identify details of your visitors, like their name, email, or other categories you deem important. You can see all these details while chatting with that visitor so that you know who you’re chatting with (e.g., Tom Smith, who already spent $800 on your website). The visitor has to be signed in on your website for you to be able to see the info. Chat with your visitors in real time Smartsupp allows you to help your visitors as soon as they need assistance. You’re able to answer their questions instantly in the on-site chat box. If you notice similar situations arising, create and use canned replies and automatic messages to save time. With this fully customizable, multi-language live chat, you can increase your sales up to five times. Record the screens of your visitors Watch video recordings of any visitor on your website in the Smartsupp dashboard. You’ll see their screen, mouse movements, and clicks — great for understanding the behavior of your customers. The powerful combination of live chat and visitor recordings lets you know customers’ needs even before they make a final decision. Smartsupp helps you keep them on the right track.

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.

module.name: satispay
module.description: Satispay is a new mobile payment system that allows users to pay in physical and online stores, send money to friends, all within a few simple clicks
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Satispay is a new mobile payment system that allows users to pay in physical and online stores, send money to friends, all within a few simple clicks.
module.additional_description: Satispay is a new mobile payment system that allows users to pay in physical and online stores, send money to friends, as well as top up phone credit; all within a few simple clicks. The app for consumers is intuitive, secure and available for Android, iOS and Windows Phone.  Satispay is not only fast but it also allows you to reduce the cost and increase the security of accepting digital payments making it the ideal solution for businesses. Customers make purchases by simply inserting their IBAN number and confirming the payment request from their smartphone. The simplified process reduces the barriers for consumers resulting in fewer abandoned carts at checkout. In order to activate the service, you must complete the free signup for Satispay Business via the following link: https://business.satispay.com/signup. Joining Satispay is free as there are no activation costs, monthly fees, or deactivation charges.  The only fee is a commission of:0.5% on payments less than or equal to 10€0.5% + 0.20€ for payments greater than 10€ For more information, visit our pricing page: https://www.satispay.com/en/pricing.

module.name: chargeback
module.description: Issuer alerts, compelling responses and real-time dispute resolution – in one tool. NOT a fraud filter, this is automated dispute management and revenue recovery. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Issuer alerts, compelling responses and real-time dispute resolution – in one tool. NOT a fraud filter, this is automated dispute management and revenue recovery. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize.net, First Data, WorldPay, Braintree and more.
module.additional_description: Chargeback is a Utah-based software company that automates post-transaction fraud and dispute management. We know your goal is to maximize revenue, that's why we created the Chargeback App. This dispute management tool picks up the ball where fraud scoring and manual reviews fall short, enabling you to efficiently minimize lost revenue and increase profit. Level-up your teamChargeback is the only dispute management platform designed to empower your team, not replace it.Identifying and gathering the data required to respond to a single dispute often requires logging into three separate systems: your storefront, payment gateway and merchant account processor. By consolidating the data from each, the Chargeback App helps you stop disputes in real-time and craft detailed response documents that adhere to the chargeback rebuttal rules set by Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. The Chargeback App provides expert guidance and support at every stage of the dispute lifecycle to protect your revenue. Consolidate all your PrestShop, payment gateway and merchant account data into a single platformQuickly respond to disputes with a full understanding of the order's status and dispute stageImprove dispute management and minimize lost revenue with expert support and guidance Intercept disputes, take actionChargeback Alerts are enhanced notifications that allow you to take powerful actions like instant gift card deactivation, cancel recurring billing, and services suspension. Allowing you to prevent fulfillment of goods and services for which you won't receive payment. Generate fast, accurate, and compelling responsesThe Chargeback App equips you with a first-of-its-kind response generator. Order, customer, transaction, and dispute data is auto-populated into responses based on current card network rules and regulations. Wave goodbye to tedious data pulling and copy+paste nightmares. The Chargeback App quickly identifies and aggregates your data so you can respond to alerts and disputes immediately. Order, transaction, alert and dispute data is aggregated into a single record.Guided workflows help you add required and optional evidence blocks.A multipage PDF and DOCx is generated and sent back to the issuer.

module.name: feedbiz
module.description: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.author: Common-Services
module.description_full: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.additional_description: You configure once and then magic occurs ; everything becomes automatic ! This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. Cdiscount Flux automatically imports your orders into Prestashop, updates quantities, prices, manages repricing, invoice sendings and many other features. Cdiscount Flux is not a feed integrator or aggregator but a cloud solution that allows you to manage your own feeds. You boost your sales thanks to the traffic and sales generated by Cdiscount and Cdiscount Flux automatically manages the entire sales process and listing. You benefit from all features offered by Cdiscount, free 4 times payment handled by Cdiscount, multiple delivery methods (home delivery and collection point), repricing (price adjustment) and more.The support is reactive and free, 5 agents are permanently at your disposal to answer your questions.

module.additional_description: La mayoría de los visitantes de una e-commerce abandonan la web si completar una compra. El Retargeting de AdRoll le ayuda a recuperar esos visitantes perdidos con anuncios de recomendaciones de productos personalizados en los dispositivos, la Web, el correo electrónico, Facebook e Instagram. De media, nuestros clientes de PrestaShop observan un ROI siete veces mayor cuando utilizan AdRoll: de cada 10 USD invertidos, obtienen 70 USD en ingresos atribuibles a AdRoll. Este módulo de PrestaShop mejora la experiencia de integración con AdRoll mediante la inserción del píxel de AdRoll, la creación de segmentos de audiencia, la configuración del trackeo de ROI y los ingresos y la sincronización de su catálogo para los anuncios dinámicos de recomendaciones de productos. Otras ventajas:● Utilice AdRoll para volver a captar visitantes en la Web, los dispositivos móviles y Facebook.● Aumente sus ventas y acabe con los abandonos de los carros de la compra como ya han hecho más de 25 000 de nuestros clientes.● Sin mínimos. Atención al cliente por correo electrónico, chat y teléfono. Incluso le ofrecemos anuncios gratis.

module.name: cleverreach

module.description: Carglass, TESA, bugatti, DHL und REWE creen y envíen sus newsletters con CleverReach®. Por qué? Es muy facil
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Carglass, TESA, bugatti, DHL und REWE creen y envíen sus newsletters con CleverReach®. Por qué? Es muy facil. Benefíciese con su PrestaShop de nuestro software potente y precios orientados al cliente y sin contrato.
module.additional_description: Descargue e instale ahora el módulo especial desarrollado para PrestaShop para automáticamente sincronizar los datos de su tienda en línea con la herramienta de boletines electrónicos de CleverReach®. Una vez que el módulo ha sido configurado, todos sus “datos de PrestaShop” serán actualizados y completados automáticamente en la herramienta de boletines de CleverReach® en tiempo real. Resumen de los datos que son sincronizados:Subscripciones y cancelacionesInformación personal de los destinatarios, como nombre, apellidos, intereses, sexo, edad, fecha de nacimiento, detalles de contactoInformación relacionada con operaciones de compra, como artículos comprados, facturación, frecuencia de compra, carrito de compra promedio, número de orden, número de artículo, nombre del producto, precio, moneda y cantidadDetalles de productos como imagen, texto y precio, materialPorque simplemente simple Así es como sus clientes reciben contenido personalizado que ellos realmente desean. Esto puede conducir a una explosión de ventas y por consecuencia, a mayores ganancias, ganancias, ganancias! Haga clic ahora en el botón ¨Descargar¨ en la esquina superior derecha para descargar el módulo e instalarlo en el backend PrestaShop. Posteriormente, usted puede fácil y rápidamente conectar su PrestaShop con CleverReach®, sincronizar los datos de su tienda y crear y enviar su primer email. CleverReach® es un proveedor de publicidad por correo electrónico líder mundial en su área, con mas de 165.000 clientes en 152 paises alrededor del mundo y fue fundada en el año 2007 en Alemania y cumple con los mas altos estándares de protección de datos, superando incluso los requisitos legales al respecto. De referencia, tenemos destacados clientes como Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL, BMW y Amnesty International, entre otros. Exclusivo para clientes de PrestaShop:Obtenga un descuento del 10% de su tarifa CleverReach® durante 12 meses! Simplemente simple: Esta guardado automaticamente cuando crea una cuenta nueva.

module.name: ns8csp
module.displayName: NS8 - Módulo completo para protección de su tienda
module.description: Proteja su tienda de los tres grandes asesinos de ingresos: fraude de pedidos, fraude publicitario y bajo rendimiento
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Proteja su tienda de los tres grandes asesinos de ingresos: fraude de pedidos, fraude publicitario y bajo rendimiento. Reduzca contracargos, aumente la efectividad de sus campañas publicitarias y garantice la calidad de la experiencia de usuario.
module.additional_description: NS8- módulo completo para protección de su tienda utiliza técnicas líderes en la industria para identificar bots y otras actividades maliciosas. Con un enfoque en la plataforma para la reducción de amenazas en línea, NS8- módulo completo para protección de su tienda está diseñado para ayudar a su negocio combatir contra los tres grandes asesinos de ingresos: fraude de pedidos, fraude publicitario y bajo rendimiento. Asesino de ingresos # 1: Fraude de pedidosNS8- módulo completo para protección de su tienda observa y puntúa a cada visitante de su tienda. Cuando detectamos actividad sospechosa antes, durante o después de un pedido, se refleja en el puntaje EQ8 del pedido. Un pedido con un puntaje bajo probablemente sera fraudulento, y dependiendo de qué tan bajo sea el puntaje, se pone en espera o se marca para una revisión manual. Cuando el puntaje de una orden es lo suficientemente bajo como para ser sospechoso, pero no lo suficientemente bajo para que el administrador de la tienda cancele el pedido con confianza, NS8- módulo completo para protección de su tienda proporciona las herramientas para escalar el pedido y solicitar el correo electrónico y verificación de texto SMS del usuario. Si el usuario verifica su número de teléfono, el administrador de la tienda puede procesar el pedido con confianza. Asesino de ingresos #2: fraude publicitario El fraude publicitario (especialmente el fraude de remarketing) es un gran problema que crece para los comerciantes en línea. Hasta el 34% de los presupuestos de las campañas publicitarias en línea es robado por tráfico fraudulento. NS8- módulo completo para protección de su tienda no solo califica todo el tráfico que visita su tienda, sino que también detecta y registra la fuente del tráfico. Verá cuándo y cuáles campañas de publicidad generan tráfico de baja calidad, alto riesgo y son fraudulentas. Podrá ahorrar dinero y aumentar ingresos al eliminar las campañas de bajo rendimiento y enfocar su presupuesto en las campañas exitosas que ofrecen resultados reales. Asesino de ingresos # 3: bajo rendimientoNS8- módulo completo para protección de su tienda incluye cinco monitores críticos que cada tienda PrestaShop debería tener para garantizar el rendimiento de su tienda y la experiencia del cliente. Estos incluyen el monitoreo de certificados SSL, si esta en una lista de spam, alerta de malware, páginas de la tienda que no se cargan correctamente y cualquier disminución del rendimiento en comparación con el promedio mundial de tiendas en línea. Cuando surge un problema, se le notificará automáticamente de inmediato por correo electrónico y / o SMS.

module.name: nexixpay
module.categoryName: Pago con Tarjeta o Carteras digitales

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: From the experience of CartaSi and ICBPI, Nexi is born to build together the future of digital payments in Italy. Nexi XPay is a payment gateway that allows you to accept online payments.
module.additional_description: With XPay you have:a complete offer of integrated payment methods: - transaction management for Visa, Mastercard, Visa Electron, V-Pay, Maestro, American Express, Diners international schemes - acceptance of every type of Wallet: MySi, Masterpass e PayPala multichannel platform, granted by a checkout page that is optimized for mobile, tablet e desktop and by compatibility with merchant's app through SDK packages for Android and IOSa simple and intuitive payment interface, designed to improve customer's purchase experience, offering several possibilities of online payment (Easy checkOut, Recurrent Payments, OneClickPay)functionality to accept payments from all over the world. - customers can pay in euros or other currencies, with a guaranteed exchange rate, thanks to Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) service.protection and security of all payment transactions. Use of cryptographic protocols SLL-TSL, 3D procedure and CVV2 security codes. XPay is also compliant to PCI-DSS standardMaximum flexibility and customization -merchant e-commerce logo on payment page -payment page integrated on the e-commerce website without having to handle the sensitive customer data thanks to a customizable interface (iframe o lightbox) -100% Customizable Checkout thanks to Hosted Fields -Possibility to change interface's language when paying with Nexiavailability of integration with merchant's working environment -Configuration of the cash mode: immediate, deferred, total or partial -Integration through API with merchant's website to handle the orders directly - advanced reporting (transaction profiling of customers, management of receipts, cancellations and Refunds, contracts Management for recurring payments) -business continuity: XPay guarantees constant operativeness, with no service interruptionschoosing the current account to which transfer payments for online transactions commercial assistance and specialized technical support   For more informations https://ecommerce.nexi.it

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 en 1: aprovecha las actualizaciones de seguridad y funcionales de todos los módulos de tu tienda, y no te pierdas los consejos de e-commerce que damos cada semana, ¡te serán muy útiles!
module.additional_description: Una vez que te hayas conectado PrestaShop Addons con este módulo:Cada semana contarás con un consejo de e-commerce, un truco relacionado con el calendario de e-commerce, al que podrás acceder con un enlace que aparecerá directamente en tu panel de control (p.ej.: cuándo y cómo prepararte para el Black Friday, para las promociones de la vuelta al cole...);  Protege tu tienda gracias a los avisos de las últimas actualizaciones de seguridad para los módulos que te has descargado en PrestaShop Addons;  Aprovecha las nuevas funcionalidades que van añadiéndose a los módulos que te has descargado en PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: coingate
module.description: Accept customer payments in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and other tokens. Receive Euro settlements or Bitcoin
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Accept customer payments in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin and other tokens. Receive Euro settlements or Bitcoin. Get started in minutes!
module.additional_description: Start accepting Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies in a matter of minutes! The extension allows PrestaShop stores to accept Bitcoin payments as well as Altcoins via the CoinGate API. Integration and configuration of our PrestaShop module is very straightforward, and the payment gateway is fully automated - you will receive automatic payment confirmations and order status updates. Note: unavailable in the United States. Accepting cryptocurrencies as a payment method Capture customers from an exciting new marketBitcoin price has been increasing steadily and, combined with altcoins, has already surpassed $100 bn market cap. People using Bitcoin are usually very supportive of companies accepting this kind of payments, which makes it easy to attract new Customers and to increase your sales. Accepting cryptocurrencies is cheapCredit card companies usually change up to 3% of the transaction amount and there are various additional fees. With CoinGate you can accept Bitcoin payments for only 1% from the transaction amount and there are no monthly, registration, or support fees. No risk of fraud and chargebacksBitcoin payments are irreversible by design. This means that you can accept payments from any country and be 100% guaranteed that the money you received will not be charged back. Protect customer privacyBitcoin payments do not rely on trusting the person making the payment, so there is no need to collect private information about your Customers to accept their payments. Bitcoin enables you to choose how little or how much you want to know about your Customers.
